hero.subheader: Start your college career here with us. CoursePlan has everything you need to fulfill your requirements–all in one place. If you see courses you need to take next semester, just drag them into your schedule.

features.title: Plan Your Semesters
features.description: Use CoursePlan’s semesterly planner to choose courses well in advance and ensure that you never miss a requirement.

features.title: Track Your Requirements
features.description: Fully personalized to track your requirements. Customizable interface to view your courses. Built-in system to check your progress. Our intuitive interface recommends courses based on unfulfilled requirements and allows you to easily drag and drop them into your planner.

features.title: Academic Tools
features.description: CoursePlan provides a collection of useful tools to help you plan your semesters. This includes a dashboard page and semester templates to make planning easier.

hero.subheader: Office hours are too crowded and unorganized. Queue Me In removes the frustration from office hours by helping students get support and professors better understand their class.

features.title: Add Your Question to the Queue.
features.description: The queue feature allows students to post their question and TAs to assign themselves to a student in an orderly fashion.

features.title: Vote on Questions.
features.description: The discussion feature allows students to vote on a question so that the TAs can address the most popular/urgent question.

features.title: Gather Data from Office Hours.
features.description: The analytics feature allows TAs and professors to view statistics about each tag and assignment such as total number of questions asked and the percentage of questions answered.

hero.subheader: Course Reviews is a course review website by Cornell students, for Cornell students. You can browse classes and view their metrics, read about other students’ experiences, and submit your own course reviews for others. Pre-Enroll has never been easier.

features.title: Search for Classes.
features.description: Search for Cornell classes using our wicked fast search.

features.title: Write a Review.
features.description: Write about the class, plus rate its difficulty and workload.

features.title: Check Out Class Reviews.
features.description: Read what other students have to say about the class.

name: Design@Cornell
subheader: Your ultimate resource for all things design.

hero.subheader: Our goal for the Design@Cornell website is to design and develop a centralized repository that contains all the resources and information needed for faculty, staff, current and future students interested in design at Cornell.

features.title: Explore Your Academic Interests.
features.description: Filter through the design-related courses, majors, and minors offered at Cornell, all in one centralized location.

features.title: Grow Your Passion
features.description: Enrich your design skillset by exploring the various events and student organizations offered at Cornell.

features.title: Connect with Your Design Community
features.description: Expand your knowledge of design by viewing available resources and connecting with the amazing design faculty at Cornell.

name: Zing
subheader: Study tools to help professors help students.

hero.subheader: Zing is an all-in-one web interface for professors to create optimal groups for class projects based on students’ study preferences. Built with the GroupEng algorithm developed by the Director of Cornell Engineering’s MTEI program, Zing enables professors to customize grouping criteria and easily match students. Our team also supports the Learning Strategies Center’s Study Partner program as a companion tool. Together, Zing helps student succeed inside and outside the classroom.

features.title: Professors create a new class project.
features.description: Title the project and indicate how many students should be in each group.

features.title: Students sign up for the project.
features.description: All multiple-choice questions in 3 minutes so we learn about your study habits and group preferences to match you best.

features.title: Professors match students into groups with one click.
features.description: Specify the sorting criteria for students and let our algorithm take care of the rest. After, you can filter by year, major, gender, and more to see the distribution. Drag and drop to swap students. It’s as easy as 1, 2, 3.

features.title: Find study partners for classes.
features.description: Students who want an LSC study partner fill out a survey to request the class(es) they would like support in. The survey also records their study preferences and other key information to ensure a successful partner match.

features.title: Get notified of study partner matches from LSC!
features.description: LSC staff can automatically email notifying students of pairings. There are also customizable email templates for different stages of the matching process

name: Carriage
subheader: Efficient Transit for Students with Disabilities.

hero.subheader: Carriage is dedicated to making Cornell accessible for all students. We work with CULift, Cornell’s paratransit service for students with disabilities, to build mobile and web platforms that improve the experience of scheduling, performing, and monitoring CULift rides for students, drivers, and administrators alike.

features.title: Admin Web
features.description: CULift riders can schedule and track their rides.

features.title: Driver Mobile.
features.description: This application facilitates communication between drivers and riders and also condenses drivers' busy schedules in an easy-to-read format that auto-updates as changes are made.

features.title: Rider Web and Mobile
features.description: Carriage’s rider platform allows riders to easily schedule and track their drivers through a seamless user interface.

hero.subheader: Search for off-campus housing, review apartments, and share feedback!

features.title: Search for Landlords and Properties
features.description: Find what you're looking for using our extensive database.

features.title: Read Housing reviews by Cornellians for Cornellians
features.description: No more BS. Read reviews by verified Cornellians.

hero.subheader: For clubs or student organizations at Cornell University, it is difficult to navigate the hundreds of clubs since information is decentralized across various social media platforms and the current platform CampusGroups is hard to navigate and not fully up-to-date. ClubView aims to improve students’ experience of searching for and applying to clubs at Cornell by centralizing key club information.

features.title: View, search, and filter clubs
features.description: Find all of the clubs/organizations on ClubView's homepage. Want to narrow your search? Type to find clubs by name or filter by category and keyword.

features.title: Learn About Individual Clubs
features.description: Each club registered on ClubView has its own page of key information with a recruitment banner to show your club’s recruitment status and an events section so people can add events to their calendar.

features.title: Register and Edit a Club
features.description: Clubs/organizations registered on ClubView are ones that are active. Those who are admins can freely edit key information about your club, add events, and show your club’s status for joining.
